arts.ttl: La Liga Round Up: Athletic Club and Villareal supercharge Champions League hopes
arts.sum: Sunday’s La Liga action included three games all with a key impact on the race for European qualification in the run-in. Either side of Real Madrid’s scrappy 1-0 win away at Alaves, Villarreal and Athletic Club both secured fightback victories, to keep their UEFA Champions League hopes in their own hands. The Basque side wrapped […] The post La Liga Round Up: Athletic Club and Villareal supercharge Champions League hopes appeared first on Football España.
